traits.Hold Breath: The subchief can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.Tooth Dagger: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Jaws of Semuanya (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The subchief invokes the primal magic of Semuanya, summoning a spectral maw around a target it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is also frightened until the end of its next turn.
